TITLE: GREEN MOON OF ALTERNIA
subtitle: felt mob manor
Game Text: During all score phases, each player gain +1 Grist for every #FELT character card they control here.

TITLE: LAND OF COLORS AND MAYHAM
subtitle: leprechaun spawn point
Game Text: During all score phases, the player with the most power here may put a boon on each of their #LEPRECHAUNS here (not to exceed max boons).

TITLE: THE DARK CARNIVAL
subtitle: are you down to clown
Game Text: When any player moves or enters a #PURPLEBLOOD here, that player may either draw a card or add the top card of their discard to their hand.

TITLE: THE BROODING CAVERNS
subtitle: baby caves
Game Text: Characters with 5+ Power cannot enter or move here.

TITLE: FROG TEMPLE
subtitle: i invoke sanctuary
Game Text: Characters with 4- Power resist 1 Power to be destroyed by attacks or abilities while here.

TITLE: LAND OF HEAT AND CLOCKWORK
subtitle: bullshit market
Game Text: Characters here resist 1 power to be destroyed by attacks or abilities while here for each Boon.

TITLE: LAND OF FROST AND FROGS
subtitle: meticulous breeding projects
Game Text: Once per turn, during their turn, a Player may choose to return their Inventory Card here to their hand to gain Grist equal to the Inventory Card's enter cost.

TITLE: LAND OF WIND AND SHADE
subtitle: mushroom farm
Game Text: When an untapped, not-invading character here would earn boons during the Boon Phase, they earn +1 Boon- not to exceed maximum Boons.

TITLE: LAND OF LIGHT AND RAIN
subtitle: burn so bright
Game Text: When Characters attack here, they gain +1 Power per Boon while attacking.

TITLE: GRAND HIGHBLOODS THRONE
subtitle: temple of sacrifice
Game Text: Destroy all your characters here at the end of your Prep Phase. // While you have a character here, all of your characters resist +1 Power to be destroyed by attacks or abilities.

TITLE: BOON TOWN
subtitle: big siphon
Game Text: Characters here gain the following Game Text: // "Ability (1g) - Move all Boons to another Character you control."
